name: Al Dente (Aya Oikawa)
description:
A game where you lead a pasta to their freedom, Flappy Bird style.

Running, or flying away, from an army of hungry customers with very pointy forks.

A project created during Art&Interaction course, instructed by Dani Bacon and Rutu Modan. Bezalel Academy of Art and Design

Game by Aya Oikawa
